summary: Implements an Ansible terminal plugin tailored for Cisco IOS devices, handling the full lifecycle of a commandâ€‘line session: establishing the connection, performing privilege escalation, launching an interactive shell, and restoring the original privilege level after tasks complete.
business_intent: Facilitates reliable network automation by providing a reusable component that abstracts IOS CLI session management, allowing Ansible playbooks to execute commands on Cisco routers and switches without manual handling of privilege levels or session cleanup.
